general.gigTitle: develop responsive website with html css and js

sellerCard.description: Hello, Iâ€™m Zsolt, a Frontend Developer with 4 years of experience. I specialize in creating dynamic and beautiful websites using HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, and SASS. I also have experience with C#.

description.content:
Welcome!


Are you in search of a professional website for your portfolio, your company, or for personal needs? If so, youve landed at the right spot! Im here to craft a responsive website for you with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.


My name is Zsolt, I'm a Frontend Developer with 5 years of experience. My skills include HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, SASS, and Tailwind.


Why choose me?


  • Successfully delivered over 250 website projects
  • I create each website from scratch
  • Responsive Design
  • Fast Delivery
  • W3C Validation
  • Clean Code
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • 100% Client Satisfaction


My Skills:


  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • JavaScript
  • SASS | SCSS
  • Tailwind CSS
  • jQuery


You will get:


  • Source Code (HTML, CSS, JS)
  • Free 1 week support
  • Unlimited Revision


Tools:


  • Visual Studio Code
  • Playwright for Cross-Browser Testing
  • Prettier for Code Formatting


NOTE: BEFORE YOU ORDER PLEASE DIRECT MESSAGE ME ABOUT THE PROJECT!


If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. I will answer as fast as possible.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you send updates about the progress of the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, I provide daily updates with screenshots and videos.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you add a contact form to the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can add a functioning contact form to the website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you upload the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, if you have a domain and hosting, I can upload the website for you.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: Develop a responsive one-page website with up to 4 sections

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Develop a responsive website with 3 pages

reviews.comment: Zsolt did an excellent job of delivering on my request. He definitely knows HTML, CSS, and Javascript. His response time was super fast. He delivered in less than 24 hours. He is a "no-nonsense, get the job done" kind of guy. I'm sure I'll be using him again.

Zsolt truly EXCEEDED my expectations with his impeccable website development skills. His attention to detail ensured a BUG-FREE and professional outcome, while his POLITENESS and language fluency made collaboration an absolute pleasure. I HIGHLY recommend him for QUICK and high-quality workâ€”try it for yourself and you wonâ€™t be disappointed! ðŸ‘

Zsolt is a very professional developer and working with him is a real pleasure. Efficient, pro-active communication, fast delivery and high attention to detail. Looking forward to many more joint projects.
excellent work. highly recommended for building sites from scratch and or editing website content. very clean code. quick delivery, good eye for design.

Zsolt did an outstanding job on my website! He was professional, efficient, and highly skilled, delivering exactly what I needed. His attention to detail and ability to bring my vision to life exceeded my expectations. Communication was smooth, and he made the entire process easy. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a reliable and talented developer!
